__e: That all sounds fine, Herr General but if you pardon me for saying so, people here want proof of good intentions.
That's very kind of her, Herr General.
- It was an order, Herr General, wasn't it?
Herr Doktor, how kind of you to come!
The Herr Doctor is a very charming gentleman and his table is one of the best in the country.
You know so well, Herr Doctor, how the body revolts when life leaves it.
Well, let's see how funny it is when you write a letter to the girl you love and you need to choose between Windsong and Herr von Muellerhoff, and you choose wrong and lose her forever.
You know, Herr Von Schneer, your father and men like him taught us a great deal about convincing people to answer questions.
I think we better take out the light altogether... von Basil must be quiet at all times.
I can't help but notice, Herr Hitler, the mountain air has done you good.
But I would like to see Herr Hitler went overboard before me.
He didn't say much, he hardly ever did but he let it be known that it wasn't wise to go around saying bad things about Hitler.
